subject: Inquiry on Delivery Status
description_text:
Hello Sir/Maam,

I would like to inquire on the current status of an item that I've
purchased with your establishment.

Order Number : #SSN2805
Confirmed Date: 1 October 2025
Item: Green Elastomers

The status has remained unchanged despite passing 10 days, therefore I
would like to know if my order is being processed or not.

Thank you for your assistance.

conversations.body_text: Hi Ammar Haziq,  We sincerely apologize for the delay in shipping your order. We have just concluded our 8-day holiday. Here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045961518312
